scripts.gym-app:android: cd projects/gym-app && ionic cap run android
scripts.dev: npm run library:build && npm run dev:parallel
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run library:watch" "npm run gym-admin:serve" "npm run gym-app:serve" --names "lib,admin,app" --prefix-colors "yellow,cyan,magenta"
scripts.dev:with-emulator: npm run library:build && concurrently "npm run emulator:start" "npm run gym-admin:serve" "npm run gym-app:serve" --names "emulator,admin,app" --prefix-colors "green,cyan,magenta"
scripts.dev:with-firebase: npm run library:build && concurrently "npm run gym-admin:serve:firebase" "npm run gym-app:serve:firebase" --names "admin,app" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta"
scripts.gym-admin:with-emulator: npx concurrently "npm run emulator:start" "npm run gym-admin:serve" --names "emulator,admin" --prefix-colors "green,cyan"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd projects/gym-admin && npm install && cd ../gym-app && npm install && cd ../gym-library && npm install
